<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/integrations/definitions/sources/{source_definition_id}/catalog"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



**Requires an Access Token as the bearer token.**

Get a source connector specification catalog.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"source_definition_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","title":"Source Definition Id"}},{"name":"query","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","description":"JMESPath query to filter the catalog. Example: `streams[].name` (names only) or `streams[?name=='users']` (users stream only).","title":"Query"},"description":"JMESPath query to filter the catalog. Example: `streams[].name` (names only) or `streams[?name=='users']` (users stream only)."},{"name":"x-organization-id","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations.","title":"X-Organization-Id"},"description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
